cz.ive.xmlload
Class XMLDOMLoader

java.lang.Object
  cz.ive.xmlload.XMLDOMLoader

public class XMLDOMLoader
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains functions related to load of ive world from it's xml representation

Author:
thorm

load

public void load(java.net.URL url)
          throws java.lang.Exception
Load IveWorld from XML file. It fills TemplateMap.instance() with object and location templates and ProcessDB.instance() with ProcessTemplates,

Parameters:
url - location where the valid XML document is stored
Throws:
java.lang.Exception
